The large wheel on the left is a Ferris wheel, a type of amusement ride consisting of a rotating upright wheel with multiple passenger-carrying components attached to its rim. The passengers ride in the wheel as it rotates, providing them with a panoramic view of the surrounding area.

The large wheel on the left is a Ferris wheel, which is an amusement ride that consists of a large wheel with gondolas or cars that are attached to the wheel. The passengers ride the wheel and can view the scenery from the top of the wheel.
